This webpage houses an HTML version of the talk "Are anaerobic energy-generation pathways significant contributors to stream energy budgets?", presented at the 2021 annual meeting of the Society for Freshwater Science (SFS) by Michelle Catherine Kelly. Source code behind the analysis is linked above.
